headline: Evergy Releases 2025 Results, Announces New Large Customers, Declares Quarterly Dividend and Establishes 2026 Guidance
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., February 19, 2026--Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) today announced full year 2025 GAAP earnings of $855.6 million, or $3.66 per share, compared to GAAP earnings of $873.5 million, or $3.79 per share, for the full year 2024. Fourth quarter 2025 GAAP earnings were $84.3 million, or $0.36 per share, compared to earnings of $78.2 million, or $0.34 per share, for the fourth quarter of 2024.
